name: City Tour Coach Bus Driving
description:
Get ready to enjoy the city tour coach bus chained with car driver skills & chained Bus Coach Driving Simulator skills 2017. In this public transport offroad US bus driving simulator you will Travel through the hills city with chained cars and dangerous paths to reach the destination and also show your real coach bus driving and chained bus driving skills.

FEATURES
• Thrilling Bus Drive with Off Road Paths
• Amazing Environment
• Extreme Bus Driving on Dangerous Turns
• Pick and Drop Tourist to their Destinations
• Hours of Driving Fun with Bus Driver Duty
